title: Suche ryze coach mid dia atm
body: Hi guys like it says in the title i am looking for someone that can help me to take my ryze to d1-low master at least. I peaked at D1 before but i played different champs. I am willing to pay the coach as well. I would personally prefer a high elo ryze main like this guy as a coach http://euw.op.gg/summoner/userName=9894 but i am open for everyone who thinks he could help me becoming better at ryze with payment included. Just add me in game Rowdyinderkluft (euw). Discord is Max#3866
